alert.note: Alert for Grant (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 2:26PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MDT/245 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. These counties will have a new warning reissued this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of the following counties; Morton, Sioux, and Grant. * WHEN...Until 145 PM MDT /245 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 123 PM MDT /223 PM CDT/, Cedar Creek gauge in Haynes reports flooding due to snowmelt. Flooding is expected to continue across the warned area.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
